[[command_xfer_me]]
* `+me+`: send a CTCP action to remote host

----
/me  <message>

message: message to send
----

[[command_xfer_xfer]]
* `+xfer+`: xfer control

----
/xfer  [list|listfull]

    list: list xfer
listfull: list xfer (verbose)

Without argument, this command opens buffer with xfer list.
----
